Articles.Content:
I love this mod dearly and would love to be able to replace the stock version with it.

Small feature request: when you have a lot of mods installed, sorting the resource panel becomes a chore - anyway we could get a "Move to top" button or something next to the arrows (or a shift click on the arrow moves it to the top or the bottom)? I know you can edit the settings.cfg directly, and I've done that, but that didn't really work either, as things just got repopulated (I was attempting to cut things down to a more manageable level). I'm not sure what "Sort Groups" does either besides override my diligent sorting .

Anyway, can't live without the mod; just a suggestion to consider if you have a spare moment.

Cheers.

---edit---

Just figured out how to replace the stock version with your version; my day is complete.

Edited February 29, 2016 by Deimos Rast

1 hour ago, Deimos Rast said:

I love this mod dearly and would love to be able to replace the stock version with it.

Small feature request: when you have a lot of mods installed, sorting the resource panel becomes a chore - anyway we could get a "Move to top" button or something next to the arrows (or a shift click on the arrow moves it to the top or the bottom)? I know you can edit the settings.cfg directly, and I've done that, but that didn't really work either, as things just got repopulated (I was attempting to cut things down to a more manageable level). I'm not sure what "Sort Groups" does either besides override my diligent sorting .

Anyway, can't live without the mod; just a suggestion to consider if you have a spare moment.

Cheers.

---edit---

Just figured out how to replace the stock version with your version; my day is complete.

I'll give it a look when I've got some time.

Sort groups should sort each group in Alpha order

You can also drag and drop them around a lot faster than using the buttons. A to top and to bottombutton sound like a good idea

Fool me once...

 

I created a plane, using MK0 tanks for balancing things, setting them to locked, then set off to explore the great white south, since ARP was telling me I had plenty of flight time, I was appropriately mystified when my engine cut out while ARP was telling me I had 3 hours left of fuel. Woops... It calculates all fuel including locked.

On 2/29/2016 at 7:59 PM, Deimos Rast said:

---edit---

Just figured out how to replace the stock version with your version; my day is complete.

Wait!!... What??!!... Huh???....

Pleeze share...

There's a settings button (two downward point chevrons) at the bottom of the ARP window which you can use.  To disable stock, click on the settings button, then select Styling/Visuals from the Settings Section dropdown.  Then select Replace Stock Resources App from the Button dropdown.

HTH

8 minutes ago, Brigadier said:

There's a settings button (two downward point chevrons) at the bottom of the ARP window which you can use.  To disable stock, click on the settings button, then select Styling/Visuals from the Settings Section dropdown.  Then select Replace Stock Resources App from the Button dropdown.

HTH

fiiiiiiine, steal my thunder.

Basically what he said^

There may be an abbreviation conflict between Replacement Parts (from EPL?) and Reserve Power (from AmpYear).  They're both shortened to "RP" and has caused some confusion, reported at this post.  Not sure who resolves this, but I thought I'd mention it.

Ok the replacement worked really fine and all, but i still had to deinstall the mod because now timewarps freeze my game, not sure how this mod affects timewarp in any way. But every time there is a timewarp restriction, like SOI change or entering the atmosphere, the game completly freezes and needs to be force shut.
1.1 Update?

Hi, thanks for the mod. I love the Remaining Time mode and its customization options. There seems to be a small, but annoying bug with replacing the stock Resources button. Occasionally, when I switch to ship view, the stock button is back and the ARP button is added as a basic button. In the visual options, everything is ok. So I have to change the options to something else and then back to "Replace stock button". But the old basic button doesn't disappear and so I have duplicate buttons. When it happens several times, I end up with several similar ARP buttons. See attached screenshot.

There also seems to be something wrong with CKAN: it keeps telling me to update ARP from "2.7.4.0" to "v2.7.4.0".
hmmm.... no activity here lately, I know Trigger is super busy, so, anyone try this on 1.1 yet?

hmmm.... no activity here lately, I know Trigger is super busy, so, anyone try this on 1.1 yet?

i did yesterday, no luck : /
Will try and do a basic conversion on the weekend. Hoping I just need to flip some GUI calls

Cool, that's great! I did run the game briefly last night, after I figured out how to change the screen resolution, as it started in 640x480 and wouldn't apply any changes to the settings no matter what.

sounds great.

happy for any work that you can do for this.

all seems out of place with out this..

cheers.
HYPE! Love you mod so much!
Will this work with "Kerbalism" mod too?

I got KAC done, will be looking at this and TWP next

It should work with any resources yes, but you may need to download some icons for some mods if the author hasnt included them in the mod.

Sounds great.

Need ARP bad.  Forgot how blah the stock one is..

Cheers.
Totally Agree this should be in game the stock one is Blah
Much thanks for your hard work Trigger, your mods are ESSENTIAL! Keep up the good work sir
